 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵ֫גֶל‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Exod.32.24|Exod 32:24]]</sup> ==calf== (as ***rolling*** or ***circling*** about ? compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּר‎</span> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרַר‎</span>; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician (Punic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עגל‎</span> ***id.*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>336</sup>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענילו‎</span> Palmyrene proper name ***id.*** [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>89</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיגְלָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲגַלְתָּא‎</span>, ***id.***; Assyrian [***agalu***], plural ***agalê*** probably ***calves*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 16</sup> (compare against this [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>Kosmol.110</sup>, but see also Jäger<sup>BAS ii. 2, 286</sup>); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Ethiopic , compare also [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>NS 226</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> absolute [[Exod.32.19|Exod 32:19]] +; construct [[1Sam.28.24|1Sam 28:24]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶגְלֵךְ‎</span> [[Hos.8.5|Hos 8:5]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲגָלִים‎</span> [[Hos.13.2|Hos 13:2]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶגְלֵי‎</span> [[1Kgs.12.28|1Kgs 12:28]] +; — ***calf*** [[Isa.11.6|Isa 11:6]]; [[Isa.27.10|Isa 27:10]] in simile of leaping mountains [[Ps.29.6|Ps 29:6]] in simile of foot-sole of cherubim [[Ezek.1.7|Ezek 1:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְבֵּק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> i.e. a ***stall-fed*** (fatted) ***calf*** [[1Sam.28.24|1Sam 28:24]], in simile [[Jer.46.21|Jer 46:21]]; [[Mal.3.20|Mal 3:20]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּוֺךְ מַרְבֵּק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Amos.6.4|Amos 6:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא לֻמָּ֑ד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Jer.31.18|Jer 31:18]] ***an untrained calf***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶגְלֵי עַמִּים‎</span> [[Ps.68.31|Ps 68:31]] ***calves of peoples***, i.e. peoples like calves, so most; perhaps read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲלֵי עמ‎</span> Matthes [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]]<sup>Schöf. 66 f.</sup> compare [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]; ***calf*** as sacrifice victim [[Mic.6.6|Mic 6:6]]; [[Lev.9.2|Lev 9:2]]; [[Lev.9.3|Lev 9:3]]; [[Lev.9.8|Lev 9:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); cut in two, in ratifying covenant [[Jer.34.18|Jer 34:18]]; [[Jer.34.19|Jer 34:19]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶגְלָה‎</span> [[Gen.15.9|Gen 15:9]]); elsewhere ***image*** of calf: made at Horeb, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסֵּכָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Exod.32.4|Exod 32:4]]; [[Exod.32.8|Exod 32:8]]; [[Deut.9.16|Deut 9:16]]; [[Neh.9.18|Neh 9:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> alone [[Exod.32.19|Exod 32:19]]; [[Exod.32.20|Exod 32:20]]; [[Exod.32.24|Exod 32:24]]; [[Exod.32.35|Exod 32:35]]; [[Deut.9.21|Deut 9:21]]; [[Ps.106.19|Ps 106:19]] two set up by Jeroboam I in Northern Israel, [[1Kgs.12.28|1Kgs 12:28]]; [[1Kgs.12.32|1Kgs 12:32]]; [[2Kgs.10.29|2Kgs 10:29]]; [[2Kgs.17.16|2Kgs 17:16]]; [[2Chr.11.15|2Chr 11:15]]; [[2Chr.13.8|2Chr 13:8]], compare [[Hos.8.5|Hos 8:5]]; [[Hos.8.6|Hos 8:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עגְלֵךְ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁמְרוֺן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>), [[Hos.13.2|Hos 13:2]] also [[Hos.10.5|Hos 10:5]] (see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶגְלָה‎</span> near the end).
